IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package environment :: Module base :: Class Environment

Class Environment

source code

Overall model of the environment experienced by simulated IMUs.

An environment includes gravitational and magnetic vector fields, and a radio environment that models the propagation of radio transmissions.

The default environment has constant magnetic and gravitational field models with nominal values for Edinburgh, UK, and an ideal, lossless radio environment.
